I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was remade as "Hardcore" (1977) by Jim Hollander but it was pretty lame when compared with this French masterpiece whose story is so different and so humorous as well.
